open parentheses x to the power of 3 over 4 end exponent. y to the power of 5 over 4 end exponent close parentheses squared equals x to the power of 3 over 2 end exponent. y to the power of 5 over 2 end exponent equals x. x to the power of 1 half end exponent equals x. y squared square root of x y end root
